headline: Crown Castle Inc. (CCI): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Crown Castle Inc. on Stock Analysis Compilation’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CCI. Crown Castle Inc.’s share was trading at $110.25 as of July 22nd. CCI’s trailing and forward P/E were 36.57 and 27.70, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Crown Castle International Corp. owns […]

headline: Crown Castle's Q2 AFFO Surpasses Estimates, Revenues Fall Y/Y
summary: CCI's Q2 AFFO per share tops estimates. However, a decline in revenues and higher interest expense on a year-over-year basis are concerns.

raw.headline: Crown Castle's Q2 AFFO Surpasses Estimates, Revenues Fall Y/Y
raw.summary: CCI's Q2 AFFO per share tops estimates. However, a decline in revenues and higher interest expense on a year-over-year basis are concerns.

headline: Wells Fargo upgrades Crown Castle on cost cuts and discounted valuation
summary: Investing.com -- Wells Fargo raised its rating on Crown Castle (NYSE:CCI) to Overweight and lifted its price target to $125 from $105 given faster-than-expected progress on cost reduction and an improving outlook for free cash flow. The brokerage called Crown Castle its top pick among tower operators.

headline: Crown Castle Inc (CCI) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Organic Growth Amidst Sprint ...
summary: Crown Castle Inc (CCI) reports robust performance with a 4.7% organic growth rate, despite facing challenges from Sprint cancellations.
